<#macro file_stream inputStream,isDownload> <#assign groovy = "org.xdir.platform.core.internal.template.freemarker.GroovyDirective"?new()> <@groovy> fileName=model.getPageTitle() response=model.getResponse() <#if (inputStream!="")> inputStream=${inputStream} <#else> inputStream=model.getNode().getNode("jcr:content").getProperty( "jcr:data" ).getBinary().getStream() outputStream=response.getOutputStream() <#if (isDownload==true)> response.setContentType("application/x-download;charset=UTF-8") response.setHeader("Content-Disposition","attachment; filename="+fileName) <#else> response.setContentType(model.getApp().getFormat().resolveContentType(fileName)) try{ org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils.copy(inputStream,outputStream) }finally{ inputStream.close() outputStream.close() } return ""
